name: screen-cleaner
effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
short_effect: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
flavor_text: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
